channel.title: Vey fast training-Wild-Scape 498 oldschool
channel.description:
Welcome to Wild-Scape!!!
Looking for a new adventure?! Try Wild-Scape its a new server started in 10/02/2015.
Features: -Very fast training for combat and decent for skills. -24/7 Uptime -Perfect Combat -Quests -All Magic Spells Working -All Ranged weapons -Most areas complete -Clan wars fully working -Random Events -Treasure Trails (Map Scrolls, Puzzles, Sextant, etc..) -Minigames: -Barrows -Castle Wars -Gnome Ball (Unfinished) -Mage Training Arena (Unfinished) -Duel Arena -Fight Caves -Gnome Glider -Magic Carpet -Sailing -Jewellery Teleports (Glory amulet)
Wild-Scape will be a large and established private server and community with friendly administrators and users. The server has excellent stability with a range of good features for pvpers and skillers alike.
Home http://www.wild-scape.info
Forum http://www.wild-scape.info/forums

item.title: Vey fast training-Wild-Scape 498 oldschool
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Friendly bump, the community is a very nice one, people helped when asked, forums are decent but bland (but nonetheless has a developer with interesting ideas such as their posting system), server is fairly simple (other than most as you mostly have to find out where what is, how to do this [since sometimes some servers do things differently] but shouldn’t be surprising considering what this server is aiming towards - obviously).

Overall, I’d recommend the server to people; friendly community, professional staff (in some cases that is, at least with the web developer), etc.

Good luck! I enjoyed playing.

Read full topic

item.title: Vey fast training-Wild-Scape 498 oldschool
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You have a lot of empty space at the bottom of your homepage, that’s a little bad. And the forum link provided is wrong, it’s not ‘forum’, it’s ‘forums’. Anyway, the media you’ve shown presents a little of interesting stuff for some reason lol’d. I usually don’t go for these kinds of servers but I’m willing to give it a try.

Read full topic

@wild-scape wrote:

Welcome to Wild-Scape!!!

Looking for a new adventure?! Try Wild-Scape its a new server started in 10/02/2015.

Features:
-Very fast training for combat and decent for skills.
-24/7 Uptime
-Perfect Combat
-Quests
-All Magic Spells Working
-All Ranged weapons
-Most areas complete
-Clan wars fully working
-Random Events
-Treasure Trails (Map Scrolls, Puzzles, Sextant, etc…)

-Fight Caves
-Gnome Glider

-Jewellery Teleports (Glory amulet)

Wild-Scape will be a large and established private server and community with friendly administrators and users. The server has excellent stability with a range of good features for pvpers and skillers alike.
